Title: SP2013 App - Example of Using Angular / Ng-Grid
Description: An example project using SharePoint 2013 App development style, incorporating, AngularJs Bootstrap and NG-Grid.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
An example project using SharePoint 2013 App development style, incorporating, AngularJs Bootstrap and NG-Grid.



Contained within is an example of calling the data via $http (Angular style) and $.ajax (jquery) style via XML webservices and the appropriate Angular code to deal with either.

No AntiPattern Digest Checking.

Thanks to Marc from SPServices, I blatantly nicked some of his routines (getZRows) for handling XML returned.
Thanks to Jeremy Thake, for his Ubertask demo that started me off.

This page has an Ad on it any revenue is directed at charity.
